name: GravityWorks
description:
***Want to play an earlier version? Play any of our builds here (most builds are only Windows compatible, but some builds even have a Mac version): https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B5krMG-KJMlgOWRQWnlvWHZDbFU

Have opinions and want someone to listen? If you would like to provide feedback to the developers please follow this link: PlayTester Form

Some words to the wise: 

  • This browser version will auto-save, but if you try to manually save through the Pause Menu, you will probably recieve an error that you are out of memory
  • If you are on a Windows machine, the game does support a Xbox controller

We welcome any, and all, feedback. Thanks!

~Team Balerion
